author: AP
title: Tokyo's infection spike after Olympic delay sparks questions
description: Before the Olympics were postponed, Japan appears to have the coronavirus infection contained
content: TOKYO (AP) — Before the Olympics were postponed, Japan looked like it had coronavirus infections contained, even as they spread in neighboring countries. Now that the games have been pushed to next year, Tokyo’s cases are spiking, and the city’s governor is r… [+6412 chars]
